aboutText1: This site was developed to facilitate the management and sharing of timetables within ENM.
aboutAuthor: Developed by Edgar Molard during his time at SIAV of ENM Paris.
helpIntro: Welcome to the help section. Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions and guides for using the application.
helpDownloadText: Click on the "Download timetable as PDF" button.
helpContactText: Contact us via the contact page.
privacyText1: We respect your privacy. The data collected is used only for the proper functioning of the service and is never shared with third parties without your consent.
privacyText2: For any questions regarding privacy, please contact us.
contactIntro: For any questions or suggestions, you can write to us at the following address:
notFoundMessage: Oops! The requested page does not exist.
forgotMailNotRegistered: The email address is not registered.
forgotMailBody: You have 5 minutes to change your password using this link: {link}
forgotMailSuccess: Your password has been changed successfully.
contactMailSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully.
contactMailInvalid: The email address format is invalid.
registerMailUsed: The email address is already used.
resetNotConnected: You must be logged in to access this resource.
resetSuccess: All tasks have been successfully deleted!
taskNotConnected: You must be logged in to access this page.
taskNoAccess: You do not have access to this task.
taskColorSuccess: The task color has been updated successfully!
taskDeleteSuccess: The task has been deleted successfully!
loginMailNotExist: The email address does not exist.
changePwdMailBody: Your password has been successfully changed via profile settings.
taskFieldsRequired: All fields must be filled in!
taskStartBeforeEnd: The start time must be earlier than the end time!
sharedEDTSuccess: Timetable successfully shared with the email :
sharedEDTInvalidSelfShare: You cannot share your own timetable with yourself.
sharedEDTNotLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this resource.
sharedEDTNotShared: This timetable is not shared with you.
profileSharedEDTTitle: List of the persons the shared your timetable with :
sharedEDTRemoveSuccess: Access removed successfully for the following email :
